body.p:
Shepherdsville Oct 28 1863
His Excellency
Thos E. Bramlett
Dear Sir,

Enclosed I send you a petition in favour of Henry Stallings, for the remission of a portion of a fine imposed upon him for a breach of the peace Stallings is a poor man and the friend of his country. and I personally know that the fine is excessive and have no doubt it was inflicted so heavily through political prejudice; a Union man has no shame if a secessionists have the power over him; they never fail to use it with a vengence.

P. Judge Shepherdsville
vs
Henry Stallings
Assault
$30 --
10th Nov/ 63

Remit one half the fine.
Tho E Bramlette
